lead_paragraph: Andrew M. Cuomo on Saturday announced a series of measures intended to eliminate so-called conversion therapy, which he called “a hateful and fundamentally flawed practice.”

headline.print_headline: Cuomo Acts to End a Practice That Claims to Make Gay Children Straight
headline.main: Cuomo Moves Against Therapy That Claims to Make Gay Children Straight

snippet: Andrew M. Cuomo on Saturday announced a series of measures intended to eliminate so-called conversion therapy, which he called “a hateful and fundamentally flawed practice.”
abstract: New York Gov Andrew Cuomo announces plan to eliminate conversion therapy, which claims to reverse same-sex attraction; will implement regulations and economic incentives to discourage use of widely-discredited practice, including prohibition of Medicaid reimbursement and insurance coverage for those under 18.
